Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,143Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 379

He heard some good things about the guy who lived here before him.And then he received a postcard.  Hey, I used to live in your apartment. entry.title: Expectations.
entry.summary:
Author: Karaxuno

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,864Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 37

Summary: “I noticed Robin was new.” Clark says, settling next to him in the monitor room.Bruce hums.“What happened to the first one? He was a good kid.”Rain on gravestones. Doors slamming. Handstands. Laughter in the Batmobile. Screaming. Crying. Leave me al-Bruce clears his throat, pushing those memories down, down, down, “You never met the first Robin.” He says, abruptly pushing up from his chair. -The soulmate AU where Dick and Bruce have each other’s words, and that’s how the Batfamily come together.

entry.title: Forgive Yourself by Letting Yourself Love (and letting yourself be loved)
entry.summary:
Author: aviationisthere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,218Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 729

Summary: When Bruce arrived at the cave, the first thing he heard was yelling. That wasn’t unusual so he didn’t think anything was out of the ordinary. That was until he parked Nightwing’s bike in its spot and he saw his children. He saw his children. They were children. Young children. “What the...” Bruce pulled off the helmet. He got off the bike and set the helmet down before pulling off his cowl. He walked over to the batmobile which his kids were trying to climb out of. “Boys?”•OR just another batfam de-aging au because I love them and I wanted one that had all of my demands so I roped my friend Avian into helping me co-write one!

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,975Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: In Spite of All the Danger
entry.summary:
Author: crazyredd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 967Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 28

Summary: Clark’s heart sank as he looked towards Bruce. They’d had this restaurant reservation for weeks now and it feels like they rarely have any time when they’re both free.“I’ve just been called into work. Perry specifically requested me,” Clark sighed heavily as he lied.Bruce couldn’t hide the disappointment on his face.But before he could say anything he looked up at Clark and saw a beam of light out the window past his shoulder. The Bat-Signal.

Author: Speechless_since_1998

Summary: “Did you talk to Selina? His ex?! ""Hey, she's cool" the other defended himself. "Of course, Clark is more cool, but he is Superman."Jason thought that Talia Al Ghoul was cooler than Superman, but he knew how much Dick hated her, so he said, "Ok, I'm about to repent, but what did Selina told you?""She said that Bruce is totally a bottom. "Jason didn't event time to horrify that a little voice asked, "What is a bottom?"Both whitening. Suddenly sproutd as only he knew how to do, in the midst of them Tim appared, looking at the t-shirt in Dick's hands with curiosity.Dick was about to open his mouth, but Jason hit him."Ouch! I didn't even say anything! " Dick protested.“He is nine years old, asshole. You won't traumatize him! "
